description:
Light Blue Eau Intense Eau De Parfum - A Mediterranean Masterpiece

Experience the captivating allure of Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense - an exquisite Mediterranean-inspired fragrance that elevates the iconic original to new sensory heights. This 50ml eau de parfum captures the essence of a sun-drenched summer day along the crystal-clear waters of the Mediterranean Sea. âœ¨

The Essence of Light Blue Intense

This intensified version of the beloved classic delivers a more concentrated and long-lasting experience. Created by master perfumer Olivier Cresp, this bestselling fragrance balances vibrant citrus notes with a sensual woody base for an unforgettable signature scent. ðŸŒ¿

Size 50ml

Captivating Fragrance Notes

Note Type Notes
Top Notes Sicilian Lemon, Crisp Granny Smith Apple, Marigold
Heart Notes Jasmine, Sun-drenched Jasmine Petals
Base Notes Amber Woods, Musk

Key Features of Light Blue Eau Intense:

  • ðŸ’Ž Enhanced longevity compared to the original Light Blue
  • ðŸŒ¸ Stronger concentration for a more impactful sillage
  • ðŸ”¥ Perfect for summer days and warm evenings
  • âœ¨ Iconic frosted glass bottle with a striking azure cap
  • ðŸŒ¿ Versatile fragrance suitable for daily wear and special occasions

The Legacy of Light Blue

First introduced in 2001, the original Light Blue fragrance quickly became a global sensation. In 2017, Dolce & Gabbana launched this intensified version to meet the demand for a more potent interpretation of the beloved scent. The Dolce & Gabbana brand continues to embody Mediterranean luxury and Italian elegance through their designer fragrances that capture the essence of sun-soaked coastal living.

Frequently Asked Question

How does Light Blue Eau Intense differ from the original Light Blue?

Light Blue Eau Intense features a higher concentration of fragrance oils, resulting in enhanced longevity and projection. While it maintains the signature fresh, citrusy character of the original, the intense version amplifies the lemon notes and introduces amber woods in the base for a more pronounced and lasting dry-down. The bottle design also reflects this intensity with a deeper blue cap and a more saturated color scheme. For those who loved the original but wished it lasted longer, Light Blue Eau Intense is the perfect solution. ðŸ’«

Indulge in the Mediterranean fantasy with Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense - where citrus brightness meets sensual depth in perfect harmony. This new arrival to our collection embodies the carefree spirit of summer all year round. ðŸŒ¸

Experience the Mediterranean dream with Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue Eau Intense. This captivating 50ml fragrance intensifies the iconic original with vibrant Sicilian lemon, crisp apple, and sensual amber woods, creating a longer-lasting summer escape for the confident, modern woman.
